name: Horizon Forbidden West
info: Horizon Forbidden West is a 2022 action role-playing game developed by Guerrilla Games and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment.

name: Halo Infinite
info: Halo Infinite is a 2021 first-person shooter game developed by 343 Industries and published by Xbox Game Studios.

name: Hogwarts Legacy
info: Hogwarts Legacy is an upcoming action role-playing video game, developed by Avalanche Software and published by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment under its Portkey Games label, using the Unreal Engine.

name: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End
info: Uncharted 4: A Thief's End is a 2016 action-adventure game developed by Naughty Dog and published by Sony Computer Entertainment.

name: The Last of Us Part II
info: The Last of Us Part II is a 2020 action-adventure game developed by Naughty Dog and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment for the PlayStation 5.

name: Gears 5
info: Gears 5 is a 2019 third-person shooter video game developed by The Coalition and published by Xbox Game Studios for Xbox One, Microsoft Windows and Xbox Series X/S.

name: God of War
info: God of War is an action-adventure game developed by Santa Monica Studio and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment.

name: Unravel 2
info: Unravel Two is a puzzle-platform game developed by Swedish studio Coldwood Interactive and published by Electronic Arts.

name: Spider-Man: Miles Morales
info: Marvel's Spider-Man: Miles Morales is a 2020 action-adventure game developed by Insomniac Games and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment.

name: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart
info: Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart is a 2021 third-person shooter platform game developed by Insomniac Games and published by Sony Interactive Entertainment for the PlayStation 5.

name: State of Decay 2
info: State of Decay 2 is a survival video game developed by Undead Labs and published by Xbox Game Studios.

name: Sea of Thieves
info: Sea of Thieves is a 2018 action-adventure game developed by Rare and published by Microsoft Studios.
